name: Rock Band Network
description: Rock Band Network™ songs are exactly like songs purchased from the Rock Band Music Store, but were created by people like you: gamers, fans, and musicians. RBN’s unique process puts the tools to create songs for Rock Band into the hands of fans and artists everywhere. You never know what you might find! Visit creators.rockband.com for more info. Playable only in the most recent patched version of Rock Band 2 or later.
